page.title: 02LAW & ORDER,LICKEY/CATSHILL
page.content: {Crime Crime rate going down.Good attitude towards police,with public co-operation.Motor vehicle theft highest at 52%,followed by burglary and vandalism.Least common crime assault,9%.Over 50% of shoplifting committed by school-children.Many road offences;speed-checks set at the request of public. {Patrol 8-man foot-patrol system 08:00_24:00. 24 hrs cover from station. Foot-patrol encouraged because of public contact. Very few cars.Residents feel that more police should patrol area.Around 20% female & 80% male officers. {Public Image} Always new schemes to increase police popularity.General public opinion - satisfied with police work,but believe punishments are not adequate.
